vocabulary.label: Glossary
vocabulary.definition: Glossaries are collections of terms and their definitions.
vocabulary.abstract: Glossaries are collections of terms and their definitions.

vocabulary.label: Taxonomy
vocabulary.definition: Taxonomies are classification schemes. Terms in a taxonomy give names to sets of things. Classes are often put into relation via hierarchical relation ships to express super and subclasses of things.

vocabulary.label: Thesaurus
vocabulary.definition: Thesauri are word nets. They are informal sets of terms which are put into relation.
